backend/main.mo: Motoko canister handling user profiles, OTPs, registrations, and admin auth with access control and blob storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to related frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries for all key frontend files including registration flow, admin panel, hooks, and styling.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and OKLCH color tokens with light/dark theme variables and global UI resets.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading fonts and mounting the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root component switching between splash screen, registration flow, and admin panel with remounting logic.
frontend/src/components/SplashScreen.tsx: Animated splash screen with reduced-motion support, skip button, and timed auto-dismiss.
frontend/src/features/admin/AdminPanel.t: Full admin interface with authentication, registration list/detail views, editing, deletion, and access recovery logic.
frontend/src/features/admin/components/A: UI card for recovering admin access via code or username/password with form handling states and errors.
Error boundary that catches rendering errors in admin detail views and shows a retry UI.
frontend/src/features/admin/components/D: Displays a document image with loading and error states, plus a placeholder variant for missing images.
frontend/src/features/admin/components/E: Form for editing registration details with change detection, validation, and save/cancel handling.
frontend/src/features/admin/components/R: Panel displaying registration details with loading, error, empty states, image previews, and admin actions.
frontend/src/features/admin/hooks/useAdm: React Query mutation for admin password login with backend error normalization and post‑login cache updates.
Provides admin-related queries and mutations for roles, registrations, and resilient registration fetching.
Defines a hook that stores an admin setup code, reinitializes the backend actor, and invalidates related admin queries.
frontend/src/features/registration/compo: Provides an error boundary for registration steps, showing an error card with technical details and a refresh option.
frontend/src/features/registration/hooks: Defines OTP generation, OTP verification, and registration submission mutations, converting uploaded files to blobs before sending.
frontend/src/features/registration/Regis: Implements a multi-step registration flow managing step state, validation, and navigation between customer details, documents, terms, and OTP verification.
frontend/src/features/registration/steps: Renders the customer details form, performs validation, and reports validity and data changes upstream.
Handles OTP generation, OTP verification, and triggers final registration submission, showing success UI when completed.
Displays terms and conditions, tracks acceptance with a timestamp, and provides a printable acceptance-proof document.
React step component that handles Aadhaar, PAN, and optional payment receipt uploads with previews and validation callbacks.
frontend/src/features/registration/terms: Exports static registration terms covering router and service policies.
frontend/src/features/registration/types: Defines TypeScript interfaces for customer details, document data, and step props used in registration.
frontend/src/features/registration/valid: Validates customer details fields including phone, DOB, email, and address, returning error messages.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity context and provider to manage login, stored identity, and authentication state.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup with theme variables, dark mode, print styles, and splash screen visuals.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity Provider before rendering the app.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration enabling dark mode, custom fonts, OKLCH color variables, extended theming, and animation keyframes.
project_state.json: Project state file describing the app’s registration workflow, planned features, known issues, and architectural notes for ongoing development.
